languages.text: "Если бы что-то и заставило Соломона расстаться со своим верным псом, так это — угроза Лорд-капитану..."
"If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."
languages.original_text: "Если бы что-то и заставило Соломона расстаться со своим верным псом, так это — угроза Лорд-капитану..."

traits.locale_text: "If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

"If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

languages.text: “如果说，索罗蒙和他忠实的獒犬会因为某种原因分开，那一定是因为舰长大人的生命受到了威胁……”
languages.original_text: "If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: “如果说，索罗蒙和他忠实的獒犬会因为某种原因分开，那一定是因为舰长大人的生命受到了威胁……”

languages.text: «Si hay algo capaz de hacer que Solomorne prescinda de su fiel sabueso, es sin duda una amenaza para {rt_mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...».
languages.original_text: "If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: «Si hay algo capaz de hacer que Solomorne prescinda de su fiel sabueso, es sin duda una amenaza para {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...».

languages.text: "Eğer bir şey Solomorne'un sadık köpeğinden ayrılmasına neden olabildiyse bu, Lord Kaptan'a yönelik bir tehdit olmalı..."
languages.original_text: "If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer bir şey Solomorne'un sadık köpeğinden ayrılmasına neden olabildiyse bu, Lord Kaptan'a yönelik bir tehdit olmalı..."

languages.text: 「何かしらの原因でソロモーンさんが彼の忠犬と別れなければならなかったとすると、ロード・キャプテンに危機が迫っている可能性がありますわよ…」
languages.original_text: "If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: 「何かしらの原因でソロモーンさんが彼の忠犬と別れなければならなかったとすると、ロード・キャプテンに危機が迫っている可能性がありますわよ…」

languages.text: « Rien ne peut séparer Solomorne de son fidèle compagnon, si ce n'est une menace à l'encontre {rt_mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}… »
languages.original_text: "If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne peut séparer Solomorne de son fidèle compagnon, si ce n'est une menace à l'encontre {rt_mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}… »

languages.text: "Wenn Solomorne etwas dazu bringen könnte, sich von seinem treuen Hund zu trennen, dann eine Gefahr für den Lord Captain ..."
languages.original_text: "If anything could cause Solomorne to be parted from his faithful dog, it would be a threat to the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Solomorne etwas dazu bringen könnte, sich von seinem treuen Hund zu trennen, dann eine Gefahr für den Lord Captain ..."
